compatibility.notes: The MS-RL license allows for weak copyleft, meaning that while modifications to the MS-RL licensed code must be shared under the same license, it can be combined with proprietary code without imposing the same license on the proprietary parts.

key_requirements: Disclose source code for derivative works.
Include the MS-RL license with distributions.
Do not use contributors' trademarks without permission.
Automatic termination of patent license if a patent claim is made against a contributor.
license.name: MS-RL
obligations: Provide source code for any distributed files containing code from the software.
Include a copy of the MS-RL license with any distributed files.
Retain all copyright, patent, trademark, and attribution notices present in the software.
If distributing in source code form, do so only under the MS-RL license.
If distributing in compiled form, ensure the license complies with MS-RL.
